header.title: Billboard sign axed in hate speech row
header.subtitle: A BILLBOARD poster bearing a definition of the word “woman” has been removed after transgender activists complained that it was hate speech and offensive. Feminist campaigner Kellie - Jay Keen - Minshull, 44, paid£ 700 to display the message in Liverpool to coincide with the Labour Party conference in the city
header.postText: The design displayed in large type the words: “Woman, women, noun, adult human female.”', 'But it was removed after Dr Adrian Harrop, a GP and LGBT rights activist, complained that it represented a “hate group”.', 'Mrs Keen-Minshull, who blogs under the name Posie Parker, denied the allegation and described billboard firm Primesight’s decision as “absurd” and “Orwellian”.', 'She claims the word “woman” is “being appropriated to mean anything” and wanted the poster to “start a conversation” about women’s rights.', 'The mother of four said: “We are in a new realm of misogyny when the word ‘woman’ becomes hate speech.”', '“Women are getting really fed up. This is what trans activists do – this is how they silence women.', '“I hope people wake up to what is going on.”', 'She added: “I wanted it to be a conversation starter but this is a new level of absurd. I find it far more sinister and pernicious than the old-fashioned sexism where the guy at the garage is surprised I know anything about engines.', '“I’d take that any day over the Twitter troll who thinks I don’t know what a woman is. But Dr Harrop, 31, of Sunderland, whose complaint led to the poster’s removal last week, said the billboard was a “symbol that makes transgender people feel unsafe”.', 'He also accused Primesight of being complicit in “the spread of transphobic hate speech”.', 'But the firm said it was unaware of the motive behind the campaign and would be taking it down.', 'In a statement, Primesight said: “At first glance, this copy did not raise a red flag the way it should have done.', '“Hands up, we have been misled by this campaign’s messaging.', '“We are proud to support the LGBTQ+ community and remain fully committed to equality for all.”', 'Dr Harrop, a blogger who is not transgender but describes himself as an “ally”, said: “It really is not the dictionary definition itself, it is the motivation behind it.', '“That poster creates an environment for hostility for transwomen and makes them frightened.”', 'He denied that he was depriving Mrs Keen-Minshull of free speech, saying: “She has freedom of speech but so do I.”', 'But some took to Twitter yesterday to disagree.', 'Jonathan Brimicombe posted: “That someone is offended by a common noun just shows the offended person has more than noun issues to deal with, even if they are yet to realise it.”', 'George Henry Newman added: “So if a trans person put one up and someone complained and it was removed we have the LGBT saying it is a attack on them.', '“People don’t have to agree to your views, it’s called ‘freedom of speech’ [and] it works both ways.”', 'And user Lynette Lock tweeted: “Bonkers simply bonkers. There must be people literally waiting and watching for something to complain about.”

commentThread.commentText: How on earth can the word man or woman respresent hate speech? This transgender rubbish is dangerous. Dangerous, and complete and utter foolishness.

replies.commentText: Indeed - everything is going to be classified as hate speech if it 'offends' just one person from whatever sexual, ethnic, social or moral background - but the alphabet community take the biscuit to what is normal and twist it so that the police are compelled to respond!
Well its fine to offend white british male heterosexuals...

commentThread.commentText: Anyone else think the poster is true and the accusation ludicrous?The uk has gone bonkers.

replies.commentText: The lives, and even the thoughts, of all normal, decent, hardworking people in the UK are now completely controlled by the words, and actions, of minority groups that have taken over our country - aided and abetted by ambitious, political wannabees in all parties...

commentThread.commentText: Their's a rift opening up between the feminists and trans communities. Its subtle but it's there.

replies.commentText: Going way beyond subtle. Getting nasty.

commentThread.commentText: Both groups are hate groups, normal people should petition for them to be both proscribed.
According to Dr Ronnie Corbett lookalike Harrop, a Dictionary is now a source of hate words, and leaving one open at the word w***n is hostile. And I thought I was mad!!!

So just because I am a woman I am part of a hate group? Time we stopped pandering to this vile discrimination against mainstream “norms” by a small group of people who would take offence if you said Good Morning to them . I have no problem with people who are different, I belive in live and let live, however I do take offence at imagined petty offences that onky exist in peoples minds.
We have sleep walked into this madness by allowing minority group activists of all shapes and sizes to underhandedly secure the ears of people in power....

the world has officially become bonkers we can't open our mouths or write anything down without going through a years course on equally of all life forms degree. i find the complaint about the poster a form of hate speech so where are my rights to have it reinstated!
The end times approach..
I think the bloke in the background looks a bit dodgy, never mind the poster.
Why is Primesight "proud to support the LGBTQ+ community"?  Perhaps the 98% of the normal population should stop giving them any business.  Then we would see just how keen they are.
All those songs with the word WOMAN or MAN are so full of hate !!
When facts do not fit the agenda, change the facts.
I see absolutely nothing to do with hate speech in that poster. To me is is just a correct definition.

replies.commentText: That statement is hate speech. Apparently...

commentThread.commentText: Isn't it  becoming obvious that it is the trans people who hate men and women, which is why they try to be neither,  and even deny us the right to have our own toilets?

But this is the same group peddling the PC 'diversity' agenda that 's promoting trans boys to share girl guide sleepovers with girls - putting young girls at serious risk. And the same potty group who have allowed trans men criminals into female prisons which has resulted in rapes and assaults - so where has the safe guarding gone for females? No wonder this lady paid for a poster confirming facts - why have they took it down on the flimsiest of excuses ? Nobody has been assaulted, raped or been put at risk by this billboard poster - see the difference ?
What sort of a doctor is claiming this stupidity
Man up !!
… .Woman….Women noun adult human female….yep, sounds about right to me.
Ignore them simple
The country where everyone hates everyone else
A nice distraction from REAL problems

One nut after another. Why would you pay 700 to display it, I have no idea what the message is, its just a definition. Thanks for that, we all now know a woman is an adult female.....whats the next one, the definition of an adult? Loons, the lot, well at least they are bothering each other now Actually, I think ive got the hang of this whining, activist, lefty nonsense.Im offended, the poster should be the definition of person, like, yeah guys, like you know, it shouldnt like be about gender like, we are all people, its promoting a gender aggressively through advertising like, yeah. Can I also have some taxpayers money and attention now ?
